channel.title: Pking source
channel.description:
Hi , I got the idea to start a pking server. purely based on pking and nothing else, there will be room for skillers but thats not what it will be based on.
WHAT I AM LOOKING FOR: A person who can make me a nice custom client. (i got a start i need you to add jframe etc etc)
WHAT YOU GET FROM ME: Admin ingame and the forums.
Dedi specz: 1GB ram 1.56 Ghz
this is enough to hold 100+ people if we reach the point where more people come, Ram will be added!
add me on msn mathiasjuuh@hotmail.com or reply here

item.title: Pking source
item.dc:creator: @xx_k03d_xx xx k03d xx
item.description:
@xx_k03d_xx wrote:

250 players 1gig ram vps does me

Read full topic

item.title: Pking source
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:18, topic:236994”][quote author=Pwnage Sh0w link=topic=312862.msg2492321#msg2492321 date=1224197547]
Tonypker13, you can only hold that much players because your using a “508” server. It would be more if you used a 317 server or 474.
[/quote]
Correction, I’ve seen 508’s that hold 70 at a time…
EX: JCscape.[/quote]

508’s use more ram at a time because of all the graphic accelerating and junk like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Pking source
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:6, topic:236994”][quote author=hasumon link=topic=312862.msg2492147#msg2492147 date=1224192255]

1GB ram wont hold 100+ people. Trust me…

It will.
I have a friend who had a 512 RAM VPS, and He held around 80+ players.

And seehawk, Only one thread is needed…

How the hell? I have 988mb Ram and I can only hold 41 people on my 508!

I got 100 in my crappy czar shit with 2gb ram lol. too bad for restarter
[/quote]

You’re still using Czar?

Man you need to switch base, and start using Thing’s like Clean servers, Devo etc.[/quote]
Basicly every cleaned shit, dev, w-e is from wL. M.dog told me lul. and shat up czar is teh best.

Read full topic

item.title: Pking source
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:7, topic:236994”]I’m confused now so I’ll quote this.

How the hell? I have 988mb Ram and I can only hold 41 people on my 508![/quote]

You are obviously using A Server that is Unstable, and slow, If you used something like RS2E, you would probably hold 100+ no lag.
